update.description:
In this PR I address [CLOUD-108: Create UI to display SRC tasks data](https://osrfoundation.atlassian.net/browse/CLOUD-108). 

A new link in the left menu was added. This routes to `/src-results`, which displays data from each `srcsimulations` resource. Each one contains 5 rounds that contain 3 tasks, along with a Score and Total Time fields. These elements are collapsible.

The data of the task is displayed in a natural format, using a custom format behavior. A task is considered "Waiting" when no starting time has been provided.

Note that current resources only have one round and one task. They should be passed as an array. In the current implementation, they need to be converted to an array.

New elements:

* `cs-srcresults` contain the `srcsimulations` resources.
* Each round of the simulation is passed into a `cs-srcroundresult` element, that contain the information of that round. The fields will be implemented in [CLOUD-124](https://osrfoundation.atlassian.net/browse/CLOUD-124).
* A `cs-srctasks` element manages each task.
* `cs-formatter-behavior` is an element that provides a [behavior](https://www.polymer-project.org/1.0/docs/devguide/behaviors) for displaying data in a natural way. This helps to avoid repeated code between elements that present data.

ptal  @andres_fortier 

Screenshots:

![screencapture-localhost-8080-src-results-1496322251830.png](https://bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/1798032423-screencapture-localhost-8080-src-results-1496322251830.png 'screencapture-localhost-8080-src-results-1496322251830.png')
update.title: Task Data UI
